text:
You can also make types callable without qualification.
```julia> (::String)(x) = println("boo!")

julia> "hello"(1)
boo!```

elements.text: You can also make types callable without qualification.

text: I don’t know if that’s avoidable since it’s an expression, not syntax

elements.text: I don’t know if that’s avoidable since it’s an expression, not syntax

text: We could special case the simple form where the expression is a name and require qualification
